A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Loved it! I tried going in with zero spoilers. There were so many great action sequences and a lot of fun moments. Laughed\, cried. Carrie Fisher as Mary Poppins! I wish there were more linear focus. It seems scattered at times where is telling too many stories at once. But what do I care\, it was FUN! This movie is all about hope. Very Disney. GOING TO SEE THIS ONE AGAIN AND AGAIN
